title: Client stuck on Authenticating
body:
Client is stuck on authenticating then proceeds to say "An unexpected error occurred while loggging in. Please try again. If this issue persists, contact support at..."

Is everyone having this issue at the moment?

replies.body: If you're still having issues connecting to the authentication servers, please try the steps in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Support article. If those steps don't work, just follow up with us here and we'll work to troubleshoot further.
Duuuude ive been having this problem the whole week. Ive tried everything league has told me to do but still i cant get in to league. I just want to play. :(((
